attributes.action: A public vote result must be accepted by all MP’s regardless of their own view
attributes.background: When the public are asked to vote on a subject, whatever the result it will be accepted by ALL MP’s regardless of their own point of view of the subject voted on

rejection.details:
The decision of how to vote on a particular issue is a decision for individual MPs and not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
